about_the_game:
No NFTs, no microtransactions! just pure playing card fun!

On this whole new adventure you will be able to collect cards, build decks, face a huge campaign mode, battle challeging AI opponents, battle your friends or go online against anyone!
The gods are being controlled, can you build the ultimate strategy to take them down?

In this second edition, the brazilian spirits need your help! With new 90 cards and infinite strategies, will you be able to use the forest's full potential?

Features

Campaign Mode - Over 80 different and challenging opponents, will you be able to win each one of them in a duel? Enter beautiful landscapes and challenging variations in each of them.

Difficulty Levels - The game will get harder as you proceed! Get ready for the ultimate challenge!

Online Mode - You can face off your friends, or take on the world in a raked system!The adventure continues!

Card Collecting - Win games, collect cards! The more cards you collect, the better your deck can be! There are 450 cards on Kamigami: Spirits of the Nature!

Deck Building - Infinite strategies lies on Kamigami! Build hundreds of different strategies and take full advantage of all the possible cards!
detailed_description:
No NFTs, no microtransactions! just pure playing card fun!

On this whole new adventure you will be able to collect cards, build decks, face a huge campaign mode, battle challeging AI opponents, battle your friends or go online against anyone!
The gods are being controlled, can you build the ultimate strategy to take them down?

In this second edition, the brazilian spirits need your help! With new 90 cards and infinite strategies, will you be able to use the forest's full potential?

Features

Campaign Mode - Over 80 different and challenging opponents, will you be able to win each one of them in a duel? Enter beautiful landscapes and challenging variations in each of them.

Difficulty Levels - The game will get harder as you proceed! Get ready for the ultimate challenge!

Online Mode - You can face off your friends, or take on the world in a raked system!The adventure continues!

Card Collecting - Win games, collect cards! The more cards you collect, the better your deck can be! There are 450 cards on Kamigami: Spirits of the Nature!

Deck Building - Infinite strategies lies on Kamigami! Build hundreds of different strategies and take full advantage of all the possible cards!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo (2.2 GHz) or AMD® Athlon™ 64 X2 (2.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any WebGL Supported Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is optional.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 240 GT or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 4850
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is optional.

short_description: Get ready for another card battling adventure on Kamigami! Easy to play, hard to master, collect brand new cards, face over 80 opponents, build your strategies and restore peace to the gods!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America
